rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports culling and actions factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports negative facts/action taken (flock killed) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes actions taken ('flock... was killed and was being composted to guard against spread') without active reassurance.
